title: Vanke Wins Approval for Longer Grace Period on Another Yuan Bond
description: China Vanke Co., which just days ago got a reprieve on a local bond, has gained further breathing room after investors agreed to extend the grace period of another note, helping the embattled developer avert an imminent default once again.
content: China Vanke Co., which just days ago got a reprieve on a local bond, has gained further breathing room after investors agreed to extend the grace period of another note, helping the embattled developer avert an imminent default once again.
